# `FacebookDataIngestionRuleRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | `string` | Yes | The name of the data ingestion rule. |
| description | `string` | No | A description of the data ingestion rule. |
| integrationId | `string` | No | Id of the Integration when source is owned (Authenticated). This entity is created using the /conversations/messaging/integrations/facebook resource. Optional when configuring non-owned pages. |
